name: iPod and iPhone Software Update File

description: iPhone IPSW files are located in the following locations:
Windows Vista, 7, 8, and 10: [user]\​AppData\​Roaming\​Apple Computer\​iTunes\​iPhone Software Updates\​
Windows XP: \​Documents and Settings\​[username]\​Application Data\​Apple Computer\​iTunes\​iPhone Software Updates\​
For iPod updates, replace iPhone with iPod in the directory locations above. The same convention applies for iPad and Apple TV updates.
